 v2.2.02-07
 Location Fixes:
 Antrim County, MI
 Leelanau County, MI
 Desoto County, MS
 Cumberland County, PA
 Grant County, WV
 
 General Fixes:
 Cadpage would occasionally open the wrong alert when a call was received
 Rare crash handling incorrect button configuration
 
 v2.2.02-06
 Complete rewrite of the settings menu to hopefully make it more logical.
 
 There is a new "Alert Display Mode" in Call Detail Settings that determines how alert details are displayed. The default "Split Screen" will display call history and call details in a split screen in the landscape orientation. "Popup" is close to the classic Cadpage alert display. "Full Screen" is what the original beta release did.
